title: Client is completely broken for me. cant lock in champs, makes me dodge half my games
body: when i go to lock in a champion, it's hovered on my screen and my "lock in" button is greyed out.  but to other people it's like i havent hovered anything. chat still works completely fine in real time, and when im on comms with people say they can see what i type in chat immediately, my ping to google.com -t that i run 24/7 shows absolutely no interruption or change. but i seem to completely disconnect from the client (but not chat) so that i dodge CONSTANTLY. i've dodged nearly twenty times this week, dodged out of challenger, and its incredibly frustrating. i've enabled low spec mode, i've repaired the client. i see nothing similar to this on the boards or anywhere... can someone please help me with this problem?

replies.body: Even though your internet is connecting to google pretty alright, your network might still be having some difficulty getting a solid link with our servers. Let's do a quick test for packet loss to see if that's the main issue using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Try to grab a screenshot of what it says and we can go over it here!

my in game network logs are fine though, i never have a problem once i'm in game. i've been checking my network logs like every game with logs of lag and i never have any packet loss, its literally just a the client where its just lagging so badly i just dodge half my games. i can still link you them if you want but they dont really show anything problematic imo

No worries then! Let's quickly try another route to get this fixed since your logs aren't showing any packet loss. Check out your client settings and turn on something called **low-spec mode** if you can. That will disable some of the fancy animations on the client and should give you an easier time. Let me know if that helps!

yes, as i said in my original post, i have tried low spec mode and my client still doesn't work in champ select. the problem is not the client freezing, but it's as though i disconnect completely from the league server, but not the chat server, during champion select. but from my end, i'm not actually disconnecting

My bad! Missed that you mentioned low-spec mode already after our previous back and forth. Go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure to shoot them your network logs, and they can look a little deeper through those to see what's up.

oh and one last thing, i very. very frequently get error messages on the client like "an unexpected error occurred while trying to make the lobby" or "an unexpected error occurred when trying to display the queue ready check" and once i hit "find match" it takes like a solid 5 seconds before i actually get into queue. anything else i can include in my ticket other than network logs like trcroute that might be helpful in diagnosing the problem?
Attach those network logs and you should be good!
no prob! and alright, will do, thanks
